traits.label: name
traits.name: :name
traits.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

traits.label: icon-selected
traits.name: :icon-selected
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

traits.label: icon-half
traits.name: :icon-half
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention to be used when selected (optional); make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding icon in the array (0 based)

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette; v1.5.0+: If an array is provided each rating value will use the corresponding color in the array (0 based)

traits.label: color-selected
traits.name: :color-selected
traits.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for selected icons

traits.label: color-half
traits.name: :color-half
traits.desc: Color name from the Quasar Palette for half selected icons

traits.label: no-dimming
traits.name: :no-dimming
traits.desc: Does not lower opacity for unselected icons

traits.label: no-reset
traits.name: :no-reset
traits.desc: When used, disables default behavior of clicking/tapping on icon which represents current model value to reset model to 0
